transcript:
Customer: Teri mitti mein mil jawan gul ban ke main khil jawan itni si hai dil ki ye.
Hellow
Hellow
Customer: Hellow
Executive: Haan ji sir namaste. Abhinav baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji ji. Ji ab bataiye sir kya issue face kar rahe hain aap?
Customer: Mera bylead jo zero dikha raha hai.
Executive: Bylead zero dikha raha hai. Ek minute main check kar leta hun.
Customer: Jabki aaj ek bhi calling bhi nahi kiye.
Executive: Ek minute ek minute main check kar leta hun.
Executive: Ye kitne baje se dikha raha hai sir?
Customer: Ab subah se hi dikha raha hai.
Customer: Matlab raat se hi. Subah chodiye raat se hi.
Executive: Haan sir aapka jo bylead balance hai wo zero hai. Because aapne apne jo kote ki lead hai wo sari consume kar li hain. Ek minute main aapko detail bhi bata deta hun aapne kab kab lead consume kiya hai.
Hellow
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aaj 13 tarikh ko aapne sir consume kiya hai ek lead.
Customer: Hmm bylead.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Aniket Kumar ji se aapki baat hui thi na?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Haan. To sir aapne aaj ke matlab uski lead consume kar liya hai.
Customer: Sir per day kitna humko lead milta hai?
Executive: Haan wo main aapko sara sab kuch bata raha hun. Dekhiye aapko ek week mein 17 bylead milti hain, thik hai? Aur jismein se daily aapko ek lead milti hai aur weekly 10. Matlab 10 plus 7, 17 bylead. Ab weekly wali aapko within a week consume karni hoti hain. Jaise maan lijiye for example 10 bylead aapko Sunday ko mil rahi, thik hai?
Customer: To agle Sunday tak aapko wo 10 consume karni hoti. Nahi to fir wo lapse ho jayengi. Aur jo sir daily ek ek bylead milti hai wo aapko daily base pe consume karna hoga.
Customer: To sir bolenge to sir per sir matlab weekly 70 sir rehta hai, per day ka 10 rehta hai aise karke batayega.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi sir per day one rehti hai aur weekly 10.
Customer: Ye kya hai ye kya hai sir kya weekly one rehti hai.
Hellow
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji. Wahi main keh raha hun weekly aapko 10 bylead milti hai aur daily basis pe ek bylead milti hai.
Customer: Kya enquiry bhi nahi aata hai. Enquiry bhi nahi hai. Enquiry jo aata hai wo bhi nahi hai.
Executive: Dekhiye enquiry ka kya scene hai na sir, bylead hum log dete hain aur enquiry jaise aapka catalog dekh ke aati hai. Agar hum baat kare November month mein to November month mein hum logo ko 31 enquiries aayi hain.
Executive: Jismein se calls jo aayi hain. Calls ki agar hum baat kare ek call abhi tak aayi hai. October month mein sir teen call aayi thi to ek call hum logo ne miss kar di. Ek minute aap sir video meeting pe aa sakte hain?
Customer: Hmm hmm aa sakta hun. Haan video meeting mein main aapko proper guide kar deta hun in sab ke bare mein ek minute. Dekhiye aap apni register mail id open kariye.
Executive: Laptop se hain sir ya phone se?
Customer: Phone se hain.
Executive: Thik hai phone pe aap apni email id open kariye. Usme dekhiyega ki Abhinav Srivastava IndiaMART ke naam se ek mail aayi hogi.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Saurabh Kumar sir hain na aap?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Dekhiye Abhinav Srivastava IndiaMART ke naam se ek mail aayi hogi.
Customer: Aaya hua hai.
Executive: Haan us pe join now pe click kariye.
Customer: Join now ka to kuch nahi hai.
Executive: Bata raha hoga na join now pe click kariye.
Customer: Hmm abhi aaya.
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's buylead balance is showing zero.

- No inquiries or calls received recently.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the buylead allocation (17 weekly).

- Explained difference between buyleads and inquiries.

- Executive offered to guide via video meeting.



Next Steps: 

- Executive asked customer to join video meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, inquiries, video meeting, subscription
